name: クリア
message: "Yes, I did! I could never mistake your voice, Master!"
Clear stares at me strangely for a moment, then grabs my cheeks and tugs.

name: クリア
message: "You know, Master, you're kinda loosey-goosey today. I wonder why. You of all people should know better, Master."
I step back to escape his grasp.
That's when I notice Mink watching us.
I have a sinking feeling... like I know exactly what he's thinking.
